item.description: It's finally here! The Northeast Motorcycle & Scooter Expo is here! Join us for a drool of a good time checking out all the bikes you've only seen in center folds: the new Burgman 650 & 400, the Triumph Trophy, the BMW Scooter and man more. Plan on getting your own breakfast before the show, we will be lunching together at noon, location TBD. As the event gets closer, I might post a meeting location for early breakfast and meetup location for diehards like myself who very well may be riding that day.
item.how_to_find_us: Just inside the front door between 8:30 & 9:00
item.name: Northeast Motorcycle Expo
